name: The False Repentance, PRE PRE ALPHA PROOF OF CONCEPT
name_original: The False Repentance, PRE PRE ALPHA PROOF OF CONCEPT
description:
This is a super super super early proof of concept for the game.

I will post more about the lore etc later on. for now you have a proof of concept of the game play.

note: the ray tracing features are a beta, AND THEY DO NOT REQUIRE RTX CARDS, everyone can run them.

it is not hardware accelerated however, so don't expect some amazing looking graphics with it turned on vs off :3
